name: Square Shooter
description:
Seriously, I don't know what the second square is. Tell your own story about it. The only thing that is important is that you bring it safely to the marked point.
There is no stuffed skill tree here. The only skills are your gaming skills. This is a minimalistic fast-paced shooter with a high level of difficulty, so you should start getting better quickly.
There is no character building over the ages here, and no fancy variety of weapons. all you have is a rifle, grenade and unlimited ammo.
It's not a circus, it's a combat :).

Features:

  • Infinite number of levels
  • Procedurally generated maps
  • One hit is death
  • Complete game reset after each death
  • Developed intelligence and reaction system of opponents
  • The difficulty of the opponents increases with the levels
  • One type of rifle - the same for the player and opponents
  • Unlimited ammo
  • The player can additionally throw grenades
  • The player is responsible for the second defenseless square

Credits:

  • Music by Lena Romul
  • Samples from freesound.org
  • Sound refined In Studio As One
